items: Start by kneeling on the ground with a stability ball in front of you.
Place your forearms on the ball, keeping your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Engage your core and slowly roll the ball forward, extending your arms in front of you.
Keep your back straight and your hips in line with your shoulders.
Pause for a moment when you feel a stretch in your abs, then slowly roll the ball back towards your knees.
Repeat for 10-15 reps, or as many as you can do with proper form.
